statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Highway';
SELECT AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MIN(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'truck';
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 50;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT location, speed, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_data;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, location, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed = (SELECT MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data);
SELECT MIN(speed) AS min_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING avg_speed > 70;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT location, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 30 OR location = 'Chicago' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 40;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS traffic_count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT location, vehicle_type, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' AND speed > 60;
SELECT id, location, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed = (SELECT MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle_type) AS num_vehicle_types FROM traffic_data;
SELECT id, location FROM traffic_data WHERE location IN ('San Francisco', 'Seattle', 'Boston');
SELECT location, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(speed) > 40;
SELECT MIN(speed) AS min_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Houston';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01' AND timestamp < '2022-04-01';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT vehicle_type, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Miami' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type LIKE '%SUV%' AND speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT id, location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT location, date FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 10;
SELECT date, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 30;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT id, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data;
SELECT AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data;
SELECT MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data;
SELECT MIN(speed) FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT date, AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY date;
SELECT location, MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, MIN(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, date, AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT location, date, MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT location, date, MIN(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT location, date, AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 40 GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT location, date, MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 40 GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT location, date, MIN(speed) FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 40 GROUP BY location, date;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, location, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY speed DESC
SELECT AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Chicago' GROUP BY date
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_records > 100
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > (SELECT AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data) ORDER BY speed DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date DESC, speed ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY location
SELECT location, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_speed DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(DISTINCT date) AS unique_dates FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT location, date, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed = (SELECT MAX(speed) FROM traffic_data)
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Houston', 'Dallas') ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE date = (SELECT MIN(date) FROM traffic_data)
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM traffic_data)
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(speed) AS total_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = '2022-01'
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%A%' AND speed BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT location, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY location
SELECT location, date, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2022'
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed >= 70 AND speed <= 90 ORDER BY speed ASC
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = true;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights;
SELECT light_id, intersection FROM traffic_lights;
SELECT light_id, intersection, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'red';
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, date FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location = 'Highway 1';
SELECT incident_id, date, description FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights WHERE intersection LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'green';

SELECT AVG(incident_id) FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT light_id, intersection, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'red';
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, date, description FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location = 'Intersection A';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = TRUE AND location LIKE '%city%';

SELECT incident_id, date, location, description FROM traffic_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%accident%';

SELECT count(*) FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', AGE(date))) AS days_since_incident FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%road%';
SELECT count(*) FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'green';
SELECT count(*) FROM traffic_incidents WHERE description ILIKE '%traffic%';
SELECT intersection, count(*) AS count_of_lights FROM traffic_lights GROUP BY intersection;
SELECT camera_id, location, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT light_id, intersection, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE intersection LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location NOT LIKE '%highway%' AND status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT light_id, intersection, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE color IN ('red', 'yellow');
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM TrafficCameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM TrafficSensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, traffic_volume FROM TrafficSensors WHERE status = 'operational';
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM TrafficReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, reporter FROM TrafficReports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM TrafficCameras WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT sensor_id, location, status FROM TrafficSensors WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE severity = 5;
SELECT report_id, description FROM TrafficReports WHERE reporter = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras WHERE location IN ('Intersection A', 'Intersection B');
SELECT * FROM TrafficSensors WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE location LIKE '%Bridge%';
SELECT * FROM TrafficReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM TrafficCameras ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM TrafficSensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM TrafficIncidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT report_id, reporter FROM TrafficReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM TrafficCameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM TrafficSensors WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM TrafficSensors;
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE severity >= 5;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE severity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM TrafficReports WHERE report_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT reporter, description FROM TrafficReports WHERE report_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras JOIN TrafficSensors ON TrafficCameras.location = TrafficSensors.location;
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras JOIN TrafficIncidents ON TrafficCameras.location = TrafficIncidents.location;
SELECT * FROM TrafficSensors JOIN TrafficReports ON TrafficSensors.location = TrafficReports.reporter;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TrafficCameras;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) FROM TrafficSensors;
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) FROM TrafficSensors;
SELECT MAX(severity) FROM TrafficIncidents;
SELECT MIN(report_date) FROM TrafficReports;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS camera_count FROM TrafficCameras GROUP BY location;
SELECT reporter, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM TrafficSensors JOIN TrafficReports ON TrafficSensors.location = TrafficReports.reporter GROUP BY reporter;
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT signal_id, location FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT * FROM traffic_congestion;
SELECT congestion_id, location, level FROM traffic_congestion;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports;
SELECT report_id, type, description FROM traffic_reports;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT signal_id, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'operational';
SELECT incident_id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location = 'Highway A';
SELECT congestion_id, location, level, timestamp FROM traffic_congestion WHERE level > 3;
SELECT report_id, type, timestamp FROM traffic_reports WHERE type = 'accident';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(level) FROM traffic_congestion WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'malfunction';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras c JOIN traffic_signals s ON c.location = s.location;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT incident_id, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%collision%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_congestion WHERE level > 3;
SELECT c.location, r.description FROM traffic_cameras c LEFT JOIN traffic_reports r ON c.camera_id = r.report_id;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%road closure%' AND location LIKE '%downtown%';
SELECT congestion_id, location, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, timestamp, NOW()) AS hours_passed FROM traffic_congestion WHERE level > 4;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports WHERE type = 'accident' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT t1.location, t2.timestamp AS signal_timestamp, t3.timestamp AS incident_timestamp FROM traffic_signals t1 JOIN traffic_signals t2 ON t1.signal_id = t2.signal_id JOIN traffic_incidents t3 ON t1.location = t3.location;
SELECT t1.location, COUNT(t2.report_id) AS report_count FROM traffic_cameras t1 LEFT JOIN traffic_reports t2 ON t1.camera_id = t2.report_id GROUP BY t1.location HAVING report_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_id IN (SELECT camera_id FROM traffic_reports WHERE type = 'hazard');
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location IN (SELECT location FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'malfunction');
SELECT AVG(level) AS average_congestion_level FROM traffic_congestion;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_cameras UNION SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT * FROM traffic_congestion WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, timestamp, NOW()) > 24;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports WHERE type = 'incident' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, timestamp, NOW()) <= 7;
SELECT location, MAX(level) AS max_congestion_level FROM traffic_congestion GROUP BY location HAVING max_congestion_level >= 5;
